Translations.Text: Avi ja rite ame tamari samaksa pahela tha'i gayela kis'sa'onum varnana kari'e chi'e ane ni:Sanka ame tamane potani pasethi sikhamana api cukya che
anathi je modhum pheravase te kharekhara kayamatana divase potano bhare boja uthavase
jemam hammesa rahese ane temana mate kayamatana divase (moto) kharaba bhara che
je divase sura phunkavamam avase ane papi'one ame te divase (bhaya na karane) bhuri ane pili ankho sathe lavisum
te'o andaro'andara dhiredhire vata kari rahya hase ke ame to phakta dasa divasa ja rahya (duniyamam)
je kami te'o kahi rahya che, teni satyatane ame jani'e chi'e. Te loko karata vadhare satya margavalo kahi rahyo hase ke tame to phakta eka ja divasa rahya
te tamane parvato vise savala kare che, to tame kahi do ke temane maro palanahara kano banavi udavi dese
ane dharatine sapata medana kari dese
jemam na to tame valanka joso ane na to khada
je divase loko pokaravavalani pachala calase, jemam kami pana khami nahim hoya ane krpalu allaha samaksa darekano avaja nico tha'i jase. Tamane banabanata sivaya kami pana nahim sambhalaya
te divase bhalamana kami kama nahim ave, parantu jene rahamana (allaha) paravanagi ape ane teni vatane pasanda kare
je kami temani agala-pachala che tene allaha ja jane che, sarjanonum jnana tenathi ucca nathi tha'i sakatum
dareka cahera, te jivita ane baki rahenara, vyavasthapaka allahani samaksa sampurna ajiji sathe jhukela hase, ni:Sanka te barabada tha'i gayo jene atyacara karyo
ane je satkarya karase ane sathe sathe imana pana dharavato hase, to tene na to an'yaya thavano bhaya hase ane na to teno adhikara chinava'i javano
Evi ja rite ame tamara para arabi bhasamam kura'ana avatarita karyum ane dareka rite bhayani vato sambhalavi, jethi loko darava lage. Athava temana hrdayamam cintana-manana thaya
